title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing someone signing a piece of paper in a dream

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of a dream about a person signing a paper in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. This is one of the visions that announces to the dreamer the good that he will gain, and the dream may indicate a relationship if the dreamer is not married and is not single. Money that satisfies the dreamer’s heart and that happens to him in a short period of time brings many blessings and he is happy with it. A person signing a piece of paper in a single woman’s dream symbolizes joy. The father is engaged or married, a lot of inheritance and he is happy with that. Evidence that you earn a lot of money – by collecting something It was sold or won and won the competition. It expresses a person’s opinion of goodness, and God blesses him. See also: - Interpretation of seeing someone writing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of signing a bachelor’s paper. It indicates hearing certain news that will make one girl very happy. It heralds joy and pleasure for the girl and an engagement or The marriage of a good man. Evidence that you have found a new job or a job that you are very happy with. Perhaps this paper links its goals and is based on research in reality. I dreamed of falling on a white paper in a dream, an indication of sincere repentance to God. The signature of an unmarried girl in a dream on a white paper It expresses her anger because she has done something in her life that she strongly rejects. See also: - Interpretation of seeing seals or seals in a dream. Seeing a seal and signature in a dream is evidence that he is seeking to fulfill many desires, and the dreamer will achieve many achievements and be proud of them. A seal is evidence of the acquisition of a respectable and high position The seal symbolizes the acquisition of personal advantages for the dreamer. What if he saw it in a dream? The seal was made of silver or iron. It represents the collection of large sums of money. I saw in my dream that I sealed many papers, which indicates that successes were achieved and what the dreamer was looking for, A great victory and a rise in status. It is also evidence of occupying a high position in society. I dreamed that I was sealing a paper, but my father died at that time. It indicates that the vision is reversed to the opposite, or obtaining a job, but for a temporary period. As for signing travel documents or a work contract, it means achieving success. And winning goals. I saw that I signed the bank instrument to warn you of the crisis and distress in your financial situation, and God is the Most High, the Greatest. The director’s signature on the single woman’s dream This indicates that she has achieved much of what she was looking for with great success in her life. An indication of her high social status among people. It is With the stability of the girl’s health and psychological condition at this stage of her life. As for seeing a contract in a dream, it expresses a covenant or covenant before God with someone. I have signed a contract in a dream, an indication of interest for a long time in matters of engagement and marriage. A contract and signing it in a dream for an unmarried woman means hearing news. Good and happy. She may move to another country and travel, and God knows best. But if she sees herself signing a contract, this is the fulfillment of the desires she wants to fulfill. Signing in a dream for a divorced woman is evidence of reconciliation or returning to her home and again to her husband. It indicates the elimination of many disputes. And problems in one's life, the end of the grieving period

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing strawberries in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing strawberries in a dream: God created many types of fruits and vegetables that are distinguished by their different types and sizes and have multiple benefits, including providing the body with vitamins and fiber, in addition to containing natural sugar, such as: It is also considered a healthy fast food, unlike fast food such as loaded pizza. In calories. Which harms the body and causes obesity. Fruit is an ideal source of food that helps a person perform his daily work energetically and energetically. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing strawberries? A dream about seeing strawberries in a dream for married people. Strawberries are considered one of men’s favorite fruits. They are distinguished by their wonderful color and delicious taste. They are eaten fresh with seeds or juice. It is also combined with other fruits to make some drinks. It is also used in preparing some desserts, and strawberries are called ground berries. A married woman eating strawberries in a dream is considered a good sign that pregnancy will occur soon. Also, the fact that a married woman buys strawberries indicates her hard work to achieve psychological stability. Seeing a married woman picking strawberries is It is a good omen that she will be free of seizures. Also, the presence of strawberries in a married woman’s dream indicates compassion between her and her husband. In addition, a married woman seeing strawberries indicates that changes will occur in her life. Interpretation of seeing strawberries in a dream for single women: Strawberries belong to the family of pink plants and their color also changes three times. While it grows. They are green, white, then pink and finally red. They are vascular plants. Sandy areas are considered the best for its cultivation. The United States of America is the most productive for them. Strawberries in the dream of an unmarried person are a good sign of her marriage to a moral and religious man. In addition, black strawberries for individuals are a harbinger that the shome is going through obstacles in her life. If the unmarried woman is engaged and sees strawberries It turns black, this indicates her separation from that person. Also, an unmarried woman giving strawberries as a gift to her fiancé indicates her disagreement and the existence of some problems between them. Also, single people who eat strawberries indicate that they are seeking to start a new page in their lives and overcome what they have gone through. It.Dream of seeing strawberries in a dreamAl-OsaimiStrawberries are a hybrid fruit produced from wild berries grown in North America and Chile. It is also called strawberry with strawberries and has various varieties. Their season starts from April to June and they can be eaten all year long, even frozen. Dreaming about picking strawberries is a good omen that indicates that you are hearing good news. Also, seeing the dreamer squeezing strawberries is good for the patient. In addition, eating strawberry jam heralds the viewer’s distance from people. Those who hate him. Seeing white strawberries for the pioneer indicates his kindness, righteousness, and justice. Also, the dreamer who eats white strawberries portends his failure to achieve his dreams and his inability to finish what he started.

title: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful woman. Beauty is a blessing from God, and God has described the people of Paradise with the qualities of beauty and freshness. A pregnant or divorced woman, and we will present it to you today through the Roya website. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman by Ibn Sirin. A beautiful woman in a dream indicates improved living conditions and the fulfillment of dreams. Seeing a beautiful woman in short clothes indicates the turmoil to which the viewer is exposed. If a man sees that he has married a beautiful and elegant woman, it indicates a promotion or transfer to a prestigious position with a satisfactory salary. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman in a man’s dream: A single young man seeing a beautiful woman in a dream indicates the beginning of a new life by embarking on a new job or journey. Seeing a beautiful woman called a world or a blessing indicates a good life and a profitable project. Seeing a beautiful woman in a man’s dream is a sign. On the departure of sadness and anxiety and hearing good news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman in one dream. If a girl sees a beautiful woman, it means that she heard good news. A beautiful woman in a girl’s dream indicates the fulfillment of her aspirations and dreams. If she sees an elegant and beautiful girl wearing precious jewelry, it portends good luck and marriage From a wealthy man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman in a married dream. Seeing a beautiful and fat woman in a married woman’s dream indicates well-being and well-being. If a woman sees that her husband has married a beautiful woman, this indicates that he has obtained a prestigious job and may indicate buying a new car and a house. Vision A beautiful woman in a married dream indicates good news, hearing good news, joys, happy occasions, the arrival of the world, and the end of sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman in a pregnant dream. Seeing a beautiful woman in a pregnant dream indicates safety, security, and ease of childbirth. Seeing a beautiful smiling woman in a pregnant dream indicates Prosperity and family stability. A beautiful pregnant woman may mean the birth of a beautiful woman and the pregnant woman will be happy with her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful woman in a dream of a divorced and widowed woman. Seeing a beautiful woman in a dream, divorced or widowed, is one of the good visions that indicate the transformation of sadness into joy, the arrival of the world, and material and moral stability. A vision A beautiful woman laughing in a dream, divorced and widowed. It indicates the end of worries and anxiety and recovery from illness. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a beautiful and elegant girl in her clothes, it indicates success in studies if she is a student, or obtaining a high position and a promotion in the job. If she is an employee, she will enjoy a good reputation. Seeing a beautiful girl in one’s dream means a happy marriage and a satisfactory life with whomever she chooses for her married life. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a single married man. If a man sees that he has married a beautiful girl and is in fact married, it indicates the opening of the doors of goodness and success in his trade. If he is a merchant, he will be promoted at work, and he will be promoted if he is an employee in a company or factory. Seeing a man marrying a talented woman means a big change in his life for the better and an improvement in his material, social and psychological conditions. Interpretation of a dream about a beautiful girl that I do not know. Seeing a beautiful girl heralds good luck and a year full of

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting off his liver in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about cutting off his liver in a dream and he could be infected with it, in addition to the fact that the site and those who maintain it have no input into the interpretations. Interpretation of dreams about cutting off his liver in a dream Seeing a person cutting raw liver in a dream may mean that he leaves some acquaintances, and God knows best. In the event that If someone saw that he was intentionally cutting his liver, this may indicate some adversities that the dreamer may face during this period and should be ruled out. In case you saw intentionally cutting his liver in the dream, this may indicate some material crises that the dreamer faces in his life during that period. days. If you see yourself cutting a liver in a dream, this may indicate negative changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. It may indicate Dreaming of cutting a large nail in a dream indicates the dreamer’s upcoming happiness in his life during this period. If a person sees him cutting his nails in a dream, this indicates enjoying good days in the life of the dreamer. The dreamer during this period, and God knows best. If you dream that you cut a golden necklace, this may indicate the severing of family ties, and God knows best. If You saw yourself cutting a golden collar in a dream, this may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Seeing yourself cutting golden roads in a dream may indicate the distance of obstacles that the dreamer may face with his family and relatives during this time, and God knows best. If you see yourself cutting a dessert in a dream, this may indicate the upcoming goodness of the dreamer during this period. If you see yourself cutting a cake in a dream, this may indicate the money that a great heir will gain, and God knows best. Seeing cars blocking the roads may indicate positive changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life during these days. A person’s dream of cutting off a highway may be an indication of changes for the better, and God knows best. title: Dreams show the appearance of the eye and envy

preview.html: Dreams indicate the appearance of the evil eye and envy through the vision website roy2a.com. The evil eye and envy are among the evil ways that a person can embody. It is proven by the Qur’an, Sunnah and consensus and leads to a lot of worry and sorrow in the life of envy and its exposure to evil, and the best treatment for the eye and envy is the remembrance of God and forgiveness, and today, through this article we will present to youDreams show the appearance of the eye and envyFor great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us. Dreams show the appearance of the eye and envyIbn Sirin explained the vision of performing prayer in a dream, as it indicates the exit of the eye and envy of the visionary. Seeing a bright light in a dream states that the dreamer will get rid of all the worries and anxiety that he is going through due to the evil eye and envy. Drinking Zamzam water in a dream indicates the mood of the visionary in his eye and the envy to which he is exposed. Eating honey and black seed in a dream is the bestowal of goodness and livelihood on the visionary, and his recovery from the evil eye and envy. Seeing an unmarried woman killing a snake in a dream shows that she got rid of the evil people who envy and hate her. Cooking delicious food in a married woman’s dream announces the exit of the eye and envy from her life. Seeing rust inside the house in a dream indicates that the people of the house get rid of the evil eye and envy. Eliminating cockroaches or ants in a dream indicates that the dreamer has overcome the difficulties he faced due to the evil eye and envy. Seeing a single woman appear and disappear birth control pills in a dream indicates her recovery from envy and the exit of the eye. Seeing wounds on the body in a dream indicates that God will grant the dreamer healing from the eye in his life. Pills and bruises in a dream It also indicates the exit of the evil eye and envy from the dreamer's life. Dreams indicate the evil eye and envy If the dreamer sees something bad in a dream, this vision is considered a warning to the dreamer to get closer to God and stay away from all the eyes and envy exposed to him, and God knows best. Seeing a black snake in a dream indicates the presence of Who is jealous of God and hates Him, and God knows best. Cats and dogs in a dream also indicate that the fortune teller is exposed to envy and the evil eye. Seeing a hedgehog in a dream indicates the presence of the evil eye and envy in the dreamer’s life. Reading the Qur’an in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller gets rid of her worries from the evil eye and envy. Yawning in a dream also indicates recovery from the evil eye and envy.

title: Interpretation: I saw my divorced wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation: I saw my divorced wife in a dream. There are many events and situations that we may encounter during our sleep, and these events often leave us confused and with many questions, about the reason for this vision and what it means, and in fact there are many. The reasons why we see these dreams, especially since the majority of the dreams we see in our dreams are the harvest of our thoughts or it may be a message from Almighty God about an event that is about to happen. To meet you through our article on the interpretation of my divorced wife in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman in a dream If a man sees his ex-wife in a dream, and she is beautiful and happy, and in a dream he feels joy and pleasure to see her, then the meaning of this dream is that this woman will soon bring him happy news. Among the visions are not The good news is that he sees his ex-wife with an ugly face, or her clothes are shabby, and he is upset to see her in a dream because she conveys to him news that he does not like. And whoever sees in a dream that he divorced his wife, this vision does not bode well. Divorcing one's wife in a dream means leaving his job or removing her from it and causing him problems because of it. If he dreams that he divorced his wife once, then this dream symbolizes the possibility of him returning to his job again later. To leave her and when he dreams that he divorces his wife three times permanently, the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer will not be able to find this job again. Seeing my ex-wife pregnant in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that his ex-wife is pregnant and she was not in reality, this dream symbolizes a lot One of the problems and sorrows that a divorced woman suffers due to her divorce. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream returning to her husband. If a man falls ill and sees in a dream that his divorced wife has returned to his home, then this vision indicates that God Almighty will heal him from his illness. It is said that she returns to her previous state, whether it is That state is good or bad. If a man sees his separated wife returning to his home in a dream, this vision indicates that he is returning to what he was before, such as returning to the job he was in. He met her and left that job a long time ago. Or go back to meet her for something like this. Interpretation of a dream about my divorced wife. If a man sees in a dream that he is having sex with his divorced wife, then this vision symbolizes the man’s feeling toward his ex-wife because he misses her and wants to restore their marriage again. Some commentators said in the interpretation of this vision That means that God Almighty will bring them together again, marry them, and live happily ever after. Some dream interpreters also gave an interpretation that has nothing to do with the divorced wife, and they said that the meaning of this vision is that God Almighty gives the dreamer something that he desires to achieve for a long time, and what he wishes will happen to him. To him soon. Therefore, we have reached the end of our article through which we learned about the interpretation of my divorced wife in a dream, so seeing a divorced woman in a dream indicates many interpretations, and this is due to the situation that the man saw. His ex-wife in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an old house by Al-Mutlaq Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an old house for a divorced woman. Houses are the shelter in which a person lives, as they are filled with furniture, and they are an important source of comfort and reassurance, and he chooses them according to the dreamer’s taste and arranges them according to what he wants. Scientists believe that this dream has many connotations depending on the social status of the dreamer, and in this article we consider together the most important things that were said about this vision. Interpretation of a dream about an old house for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees an old, dirty house in a dream, this indicates that there will be many disputes. And problems during that period. Seeing an old house in a dream can lead to many problems and crises that you cannot get out of. If a woman sees that she is entering an old unclean house, this means that she will face a lot of money and losses, which will lead to the accumulation of her debts, but she It will pass, thank God. And if the dreamer tears down the old house in a dream, this means the new life that will soon enter and get rid of his past and bitterness. When the dreamer leaves the old house in a dream, this indicates the rejection of negative thoughts that have been plaguing him for a long time. Dream Interpretation Secrets Featuring the Expert A team of the best dream and vision interpreters in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Interpretation of the dream of the old house by the absolute Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dreamer leaving the old house leads to getting rid of the past and controlling his sad memories. For the dreamer to demolish the old house and rebuild it, this means that he will build a new life Full of many developments in the coming period. And when he sees the sleeping woman and her ex-husband renovating the old house, he promises her that their relationship will return and they will enjoy stability. And the fortuneteller seeing the old house in a dream means that there is an unrighteous person in her life who wants to fall into evil with her. And when the dreamer sees the house The old, abandoned house symbolizes fear of the future and the changes that will occur in it. Interpretation of the dream of restoring the old house for the divorced woman. Interpretation of the dream of restoring the old house in the dream of the divorced woman indicates a lot of goodness and escape from problems and crises, and if the dreamer sees that he is restoring the old house, this indicates that he will enter . A new life full of positive events, and perhaps she will marry a good man and be happy with him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is renovating the old house, it is interpreted that she is known for her good reputation and is abandoning the sins and transgressions she committed in the past. Interpretation of a dream about a large old house for a divorced woman. Seeing the old house The spacious room in the dream of a divorced woman indicates that she is always thinking about her ex-husband and wants to return to him, and if the dreamer buys the old spacious house, it symbolizes the return of the relationship with him. she has. An ex-husband and she will be more stable, and seeing the dreamer moving from a new, narrow house to an old, spacious house, portends her a good situation and achieving everything she wants, and the dreamer entering the old house

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing naked women in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing naked women in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin stated that the appearance of a naked woman in a dream indicates poverty, whether it is poverty in knowledge, money, or religion. Seeing a naked woman in a dream is a sign of a feeling of failure, and therefore the dreamer will enter into a long series of events The bad that bothers him. If a woman sees another naked woman in her dream from Ibn Sirin’s point of view, this is a sign of exhaustion and unhappiness in life, in addition to this woman’s constant feeling of sadness in her life. Ibn Sirin confirmed that a naked woman in a dream is considered bad dreams, which indicates Many things are unpopular. As for a man who sees a naked woman in a dream, and another person in a dream looks at this woman, this indicates that he is looking at other women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing naked women in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. An unknown naked woman in a dream is a vision that indicates To the presence of good food nearby and food that the dreamer will encounter in his life. A white naked woman in a dream indicates a disorder, or a black naked woman indicates a wide diet. If a man is sweeter and sees a naked woman in a dream, it means that this man will get married soon. If she A woman who appears naked is divorced, so this dream indicates the dreamer’s asceticism in his life. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about someone you love ignoring you about being single. Interpretation of a dream about seeing naked women in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. A naked woman in a dream indicates a feeling of poverty and lowliness, and a naked woman is unknown. This indicates However, the dreamer will be exposed to many misfortunes in his life. This is also a warning because the dreamer commits many crimes in his life. The interpretation of a woman who sees herself naked in a dream indicates that this woman is absent around her and in the event that the dreamer is imprisoned. Seeing a naked woman indicates... If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is standing naked in front of someone she knows, this indicates that she is close to marrying a good man and will live happily with him all her life. Interpretation of seeing a naked girl Or a stranger that she does not know. This indicates that her marriage is approaching, but with the wrong person, and thus many problems and disagreements will arise from it. If a girl sees herself naked in front of a group of people. This indicates that this girl will face many problems in her personal life. If a girl sees herself naked in front of a group of people. An unmarried woman has a naked woman in her dream and she does not know her. This indicates that worries and problems will affect her and she will be exposed to many mental illnesses. Seeing a naked woman in one dream means that this girl will face many moral problems in her life and that she will make a big mistake with many people and on her. Be careful and return to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of seeing my husband’s sister’s wife in a dream Interpretation of a dream of seeing naked women in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees herself naked, this is a sign that this woman will face many marital problems in her life, which

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about being bitten in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of being bitten and seeing it in a dream. Does a person dream of being bitten by someone that makes him wake up think a lot and say that the bite in the dream is good or bad? If an animal bites him, then anxiety enters his heart, because in reality the animal’s bite will be followed by evil, so is the interpretation of the dream bad or not? The full answer to these questions can be found in the following article on one of the Egyptian websites. Bite in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about being bitten in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the great love that the young man has for her, which she may know in reality, knowing that this young man did not come to her Then he admits it. That he wants to communicate with her, but it will inevitably come soon. The interpretation of a bite in a dream for a married woman shows the gratitude that someone has for her from someone who has provided him with a lot of help and services before, and this dream confirms that this person will try to return part of the favor. The dreamer did it. To him, they will meet soon and he will have the opportunity to confess to her that she is a good reason to support him in life. If a married woman dreams in her dream that her husband held her hand and bit them, then this dream interprets that this husband depends on his wife in everything in his life and trusts her with great confidence This trust turned into great love. Hence, the translators said that this vision means that the dreamer’s husband’s primary desire in life is her happiness and his complete distance from any behavior that he does not like. When a married woman dreams that her children are biting each other, there is no need to be afraid of this vision because its interpretation is not Never negative, but commentators unanimously agree that this woman had preserved and understood the teachings of her religion then she was. Able to become a good wife, and when God blessed her with children, she was able to make her children bond with each other and all of them respect each other and stand by each other in crises so that they would not be defeated by tragedies. To the world and its difficult situations.. Congratulations to every husband or wife who saw this dream because God reassures them that their fruit in life are their children.. They will be united and one will not be separated from the other. When a married woman sees in her dream that she looked at her body and found teeth marks as if she had been bitten. Knowing that she was not in pain in the dream, this vision indicates to her that she is a respectable person who treats her. She treated others with kindness and respect, and this is what made the people around her, such as relatives, neighbors, and friends, love her deeply and do not hold hatred or malice towards her in their hearts, but rather always seek to get close to her, moreover in this vision. It was interpreted that God honored her with people who would share with her emotionally in all the situations of her life. If she was sad, she would find someone to comfort her, and if she was happy, she would find someone who would make her happy, increasing her joy. When a man sees in a dream a beautiful girl holding his hand or any part of his body and then biting him, the interpretation of the dream means In real life he suffers from his misfortune, but everything is bad for him. Life will be taken away because the jurists said that a woman has a happy and good-looking face in a dream of a young man or woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a child in a dream by the most famous interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a child in a dream by the most famous interpreters, each dream has many interpretations that the dreamer is interested in learning, given what Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and other interpretation scholars say, so that they recognize all the clues related to the vision, as well as the dream. It differs from one person to another according to their personal situation, while seeing a little girl in a dream indicates joy and happiness, and here are the most important interpretations of the interpretation of the dream of seeing a child in a dream by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a child in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a little girl in a dream promises happiness that will happen With the fortune teller, single women are also interested in all dreams, which makes them look at all the interpretations suggested by scholars, while the dream of seeing a young girl has many different interpretations, and here are the most important interpretations about, Interpretation of the dream of seeing a young girl in a dream for a single woman: If An unmarried woman sees that she is carrying a baby girl in a dream, this means that she will hear good news in her coming days. Also, hearing happy news bodes well for the individual in all aspects of her life. Seeing a little girl in a dream means stability and marriage. Seeing a baby in a dream wearing Beautiful clothes indicate the problem facing the dreamer. But if an unmarried girl sees a young girl talking in her dream, this indicates her emotional instability. See also: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a young girl in a dream for a married woman. There are many interpretations of seeing a child in a dream. A dream, which varies from one person to another, according to their personal situation, as a married person has different interpretations than a single person, while the details contained in the dream are many, varied and varied. Based on the interpretations that are taken, here are the most important interpretations of seeing a young girl in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman carrying a child in a dream means good luck and good news for her and her family. Also, seeing a child in a married woman’s dream indicates that her life will change for the better. Seeing a child in a dream It means joy and happiness for the dreamer in her coming days. While seeing a baby for a married woman who has not given birth indicates pregnancy. Also, if a married woman sees a baby girl in a dream, this is a sign that dreams will come true. Likewise, if the dreamer sees that a young girl is talking about it, this is a sign of the imminent pregnancy of a married woman. Seeing a little girl talking in a dream means...
